abort.one_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is necessary.

create_entry.default:
To configure OwnTracks, open the app, go to preferences -> connection. Change the following settings

 - Mode: Private HTTP
 - Host: {webhook_url}
 - Identification:
   - Username: `<Your name>`
   - Device ID: `<Your device name>`

Then go to preferences -> advanced and change encryption key to `{secret}`.

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for more information.

user.description: Are you sure you want to set up OwnTracks?
user.title: Set up OwnTracks
